intro:
Fast fights
Wild physics
Endless fun
description:
Jump into a world of fast, physics-filled action where every kick sends enemies flying. Kick It to Stickman is a fun and chaotic fighting game that’s easy to pick up and impossible to stop playing. Use simple controls to dodge attacks, land powerful hits, and chain together crazy combos as you battle your way through waves of stickman enemies.

Explore different levels, face challenging opponents, and unlock new abilities to boost your fighting skills. With smooth animations, ragdoll physics, and satisfying impact effects, every encounter feels intense and entertaining.

Features:

• Action-packed stickman combat with physics-based movement
• Simple one-touch controls perfect for quick sessions
• Multiple levels filled with enemies to defeat
• Unlockable skills and power-ups
• Fun ragdoll effects and smooth animations
• Suitable for all ages

Kick, dodge, and fight your way to victory — become the ultimate stickman champion!
